data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grismer, Lee (2008): A new species of insular skink (Genus Sphenomorphus Fitzinger 1843) from the Langkawi Archipelago, Kedah, West Malaysia with the first report of the herpetofauna of Pulau Singa Besar and an updated checklist of the herpetofauna of Pulau Langkawi. Zootaxa 1691: 53-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180617
